scripts.gitpush: npm run build && rm -rf ../hayekn.github.io/goodcalendar && mkdir -p ../hayekn.github.io/goodcalendar && cp -r build/* ../hayekn.github.io/goodcalendar && cd ../hayekn.github.io && (git diff --quiet && echo 'No changes to push' || (git add . && git commit -m 'Update goodcalendar build' && git push))
